name: Sunscreen
description: Protect your skin from harmful UV rays with our SPF 50 sunscreen. Lightweight and non-greasy formula.

name: Moisturizer
description: Hydrate and nourish your skin with our rich moisturizer. Suitable for all skin types.

name: Lip Balm
description: Keep your lips soft and hydrated with our natural lip balm. Contains beeswax and essential oils.

name: Face Mask
description: Revitalize your skin with our clay face mask. Helps to remove impurities and excess oil.

name: Serum
description: Boost your skincare routine with our vitamin C serum. Brightens and evens skin tone.

name: Exfoliating Scrub
description: Gently exfoliate your skin with our natural scrub. Removes dead skin cells and reveals a fresh glow.
